page.title: 03Types of housing.
page.content: The{High Green}area has many types of housing from the{old village}to the {new housing estate.}Opinions differ as to which is the best form of housing. {"Dirty, dark and cramped",}was one child's opinion of many of the old village cottages. But asking older people who lived in them got a different view.{"Cosy and full of {character",}said one man. The very fact that they were old was an advantage to many.{"The new houses are {all the same." "Just boxes!" But one boy said, "At least we've got central heating and an inside toilet." When considering{The Fosters,}the single tower block, opinions were even more divided.{"A dump. They should {knock it down!",}said one resident. "But where else can you get such a great view?", replied another.
